featured.text: Your dog could fall into one of nine categories: Ace, Stargazer, Maverick, Charmer, Socialite, Protodog, Einstein, Expert, or Renaissance Dog.

definition.zh_def: 特立獨行的人；不遵循傳統或常規的人。
definition.en_def: An independent-minded person who does not conform to the norms or expectations of a group.
definition.example: The maverick entrepreneur launched a startup that challenged the industry standards.
